Family Promise Receives Perfect Rating from Charity Navigator

Family Promise has received a 4-star rating and a perfect score of 100 out of 100 points for the 9th consecutive year.

READ THE STORY

Family Promise Leadership Updates

Family Promise’s influence in the poverty and housing sector has also spurred expansion in the organization’s own leadership.
READ THE STORY

2020 Family Promise Digital Annual Impact Report

The 2020 Family Promise Digital Annual Impact Report is Live
Explore the Report

Supreme Court Overturns Federal Eviction Moratorium

Family Promise Responds; Millions at risk of eviction
READ THE STORY
[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”we-are-fp” _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ background_image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/bg-yellow-star.png” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”20px” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#472D5B” header_font_size=”60px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center”]

WE ARE FAMILY PROMISE

Transforming the lives of families experiencing homelessness.
Because every child deserves a home.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF”][et_pb_blurb title=”WHO WE ARE” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Untitled-design-17.png” alt=”Who We Are” content_max_width=”100%” module_class=”fp-blurb” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#0063BE” header_font_size=”28px” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”||||false|false” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/”]

Family Promise envisions a nation in which every family has a home, a livelihood, and the chance to build a better future. What began as a local initiative in Summit, NJ, has become a national movement that involves 200,000 volunteers in 200+ communities in 43 states. Our volunteers provide hospitality, companionship, and most importantly, community.

READ MORE >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF”][et_pb_blurb title=”WHAT WE DO” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Future-Begins-at-Home3.jpg” alt=”A Future Begins at Home” content_max_width=”100%” module_class=”fp-blurb” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#0063BE” header_font_size=”28px” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”||||false|false” link_option_url=”/what-we-do/” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Family Promise delivers innovative solutions for family homelessness including prevention, shelter, and stabilization services. We have served more than 1 million family members since our founding more than 30 years ago, and we aspire to change the future for 1 million children by 2030 through our community-based programs.

READ MORE >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF”][et_pb_blurb title=”WHY WE DO IT” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/why-we-do-it.jpg” alt=”Why We Do It” content_max_width=”100%” module_class=”fp-blurb” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#0063BE” header_font_size=”28px” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”||||false|false” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/purpose/” global_colors_info=”{}”]

There is a severe shortage of affordable housing in America, exacerbated by rising rents and stagnant wages. With little or no safety net, one unforeseen expense or emergency can lead to family homelessness. We envision a nation where every family has a home, a livelihood, and the chance to build a better future.

READ MORE >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#472D5B”]

The state has the largest homeless population in the US and Covid-19 has exposed how precarious the safety net is. Family Promise is here to help.

“You can use any kind of skill that you have to give back. You’ll learn a lot as a volunteer. And when you meet folks that may be very different from yourself, it’s an eye opener. You never know what a person has been through, how they ended up in a certain situation. All you can do is help.” – Bob, a Family Promise Volunteer in Pennsylvania

EXPLORE VOLUNTEER OPPORTUNITIES >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#472D5B”][et_pb_blurb title=”Join Our Leadership Efforts” url=”/who-we-are/committees-councils/” image=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/next-generation-committee-half.jpg” alt=”Next Generation Committee” content_max_width=”100%” module_class=”fp-blurb” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”28px” background_color=”#472D5B” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”||||false|false” link_option_url=”/who-we-are/committees-councils/” border_style_all_image=”inset” box_shadow_style_image=”preset6″ box_shadow_blur_image=”28px” box_shadow_spread_image=”-10px” box_shadow_color_image=”#FFFFFF”]

“I want to help others with whom I have shared experiences. I believe that the most valuable asset given to me by Family Promise is the relationships that continue to exist, the mentorship that still takes place, and the help I have received in many areas of my life when I have needed it. I want to pay it forward.”  –REBECCA ESPARZA, GAC Member

Distributing Rental Assistance, One Family at a Time

September 30, 2021 | Success Stories

Much has been written about the slow rollout of the $46.5 billion in Emergency Rental Assistance funding allocated by Congress to support tenants and landlords. The Treasury Department recently reported that states and localities have distributed just 11% of the existing funds. Pressure to speed up the rollout increased when the Supreme Court ended the …
READ MORE

Family Promise Leadership Updates

September 27, 2021 | National News

Family Promise’s role as a leader in the fight against family homelessness continues to grow as organizations and individuals increasingly turn to Family Promise as a respected authority on this crisis.  Recently, Family Promise CEO Claas Ehlers was invited to serve a second three-year term on the Federal Reserve Bank …
READ MORE

Family Promise Earns Perfect Score and 9th Consecutive 4-Star Rating from Charity Navigator

September 17, 2021 | National News, Press Releases

Summit, NJ – Sept. 16, 2021 – Family Promise’s strong financial health and commitment to accountability and transparency have earned it a 4-star rating from Charity Navigator, America’s largest independent charity evaluator. This is the 9th consecutive time that Family Promise has earned this top distinction, including a perfect score of 100 out of 100 points. Since 2002, using …
READ MORE

Family Promise Publishes 2020 Annual Impact Report

September 10, 2021 | National News

Corporate Partners & Supporters Help Change Lives Summit, NJ – 2020 was a transformative year for Family Promise.  Facing a myriad of challenges presented by an unprecedented global pandemic, Family Promise Affiliates across the country adapted to the new landscape, continuing to engage volunteers, and serving more families and children …
READ MORE

excerpt.rendered:
Family Promise Receives Perfect Rating from Charity Navigator

Family Promise has received a 4-star rating and a perfect score of 100 out of 100 points for the 9th consecutive year.

READ THE STORY

Family Promise Leadership Updates

Family Promise’s influence in the poverty and housing sector has also spurred expansion in the organization’s own leadership.
READ THE STORY

2020 Family Promise Digital Annual Impact Report

The 2020 Family Promise Digital Annual Impact Report is Live
Explore the Report

Supreme Court Overturns Federal Eviction Moratorium

Family Promise Responds; Millions at risk of eviction
READ THE STORY
